chug.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if a car, train etc chugs somewhere, it moves there slowly, with the engine making a repeated low sound
chug.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The boat chugged out of the harbour.
chug.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to drink all of something in a glass or bottle without stopping
chug.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to make slow but steady progress
chug.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: The economy just keeps chugging along.
